context_history.summary:
- Tips shared for staying focused while studying included setting specific goals, creating a study schedule, minimizing distractions, taking breaks, staying organized, and staying motivated and healthy
- Explained the Pomodoro technique as a time management method with 25-minute work intervals followed by short breaks
- User expressed intention to try 25-minute Pomodoro sessions for better focus; encouraged to adjust technique to suit study habits, stay consistent, and seek further assistance if needed

- Tips for organizing notes in biology class: separate notebooks for each topic, headings/subheadings, visual aids, color-coding, summarizing key points, regular review
- Considerations for using folders (hierarchical) vs. tags (non-hierarchical) for note organization
- Experiment with both folders and tags to find the best organizational system for your needs and learning style
